title: Support larger json rpc requests, when a batch/array of requests is issued.
body:
When I issue a batch of requests that is larger than 4k, I get the following error, which i don't when i issue the same request against geth, parity, infura and alchemy.

Note this is using websockets, but may also be an issue using http

```
2020-04-03 22:44:11.5214|Error during parsing/validation, request: Using:
```

nethermind-windows-amd64-1.7.13-fcd450a on windows 10

works fine on http, checking websockets
